data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Kheda to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kheda, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Kheda, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary: On average, 186 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kheda, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, encourage your church in Kheda that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Kheda. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Koli of Gujarat people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Kheda.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Kheda, Gujarat, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Kheda.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Kheda
